channel.title: How come when I go from moparisthebest to moparscape
channel.description:
How come when I go from moparisthebest - moparscape, my "rep" always changes from 16-10. Then, over time, it switches back...
I know you are allowed to talk about "rep", just can't ask for it.
Anyone Know?

item.title: How come when I go from moparisthebest to moparscape
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Play N Skillz, post:4, topic:87725”]Oh, sorry, I’m usually always on moparscape. Thanks alot. Wow, that was a good idea for them to do that.

Thanks Again.[/quote]

Especially since anybody that made one post got 102 rep on MoparScape before the new rep system came in + the reset (Which I was sad about )

Read full topic
item.source: How come when I go from moparisthebest to moparscape

Two different sites, two different reps.
